reg_pit.acttitle:
Financial Institutions Act; Credit Union Incorporation Act;
Business Corporations Act
reg_pit.title: Definitions Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 211/2012, effective November 1, 2012.

section.sectiontext: In the Credit Union Incorporation Act, the Financial Institutions Act and the Company Act as it applies for the purposes of those 2 Acts, officer of a corporation includes a credit officer, an employee of the corporation who has the authority to approve loans and an employee of the corporation who reports directly to the directors.
